channel.title: Haircut
channel.description: Hey guys. Do you think I need a haircut? It was originally straight, soft, and the chicks dug it, but now it always gets in my eyes even if I part it off, and it has begun curling in all directions (you'd know what I was talking about if I were closer up and had a better webcam) and is greasy (I take a shower everyday). I've got a cyber security and computer help desk competition coming up that I'm going to, and one of the parts of the computer help desk competition is a role play activity and it was said that I need to have my eyes visible or my hair cut so I don't lose points (eye contact is important apparently). [img]http://oi54.tinypic.com/ml739e.jpg[/img] So with that being said, haircut - Yes or no? I'm too indecisive to decide for myself :|

item.title: Haircut
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:2, topic:386666”]i just got a short haircut 2 days ago

i have the same problem you do. it got all wavy on top and curled, and it used to be curly and softer. so i cut it up to mid forehead and letting it grow back out.

so yea, get a haircut, and train it so when it grows back it’s better.[/quote]

Ah, good idea.
Haircut scheduled for Monday hopefully

Read full topic

item.title: Haircut
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Hey guys. Do you think I need a haircut? It was originally straight, soft, and the chicks dug it, but now it always gets in my eyes even if I part it off, and it has begun curling in all directions (you’d know what I was talking about if I were closer up and had a better webcam) and is greasy (I take a shower everyday). I’ve got a cyber security and computer help desk competition coming up that I’m going to, and one of the parts of the computer help desk competition is a role play activity and it was said that I need to have my eyes visible or my hair cut so I don’t lose points (eye contact is important apparently).

So with that being said, haircut - Yes or no?
I’m too indecisive to decide for myself
